span.p:
üë§ User Input
Natural language requests
Preferences & feedback

span.p:
üå°Ô∏è Environmental Data
Temperature, humidity
Air quality, lighting

Time of day, season

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
üå°Ô∏è Temperature Example:
20¬∞C request at 2pm
+ Hot summer day
+ Conference room
+ 30 people expected
‚Üí Pre-cool to 18¬∞C

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
üí° Lighting Example:
Bright lights request
+ Presentation mode
+ Afternoon sun
+ Energy peak hours
‚Üí Adjust blinds first

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
üîí Security Example:
After-hours access
+ Known employee
+ Scheduled meeting
+ Weather emergency
‚Üí Allow with monitoring
